name: SIERRA CLUB, the Commission on Economic Opportunity of Luzerne County, and Eric Joseph Epstein, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Sierra Club v. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission
docket_number: Appeal Nos. 77 and 78 M.D. Appeal Docket 1998

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: SIERRA CLUB, the Commission on Economic Opportunity of Luzerne County, and Eric Joseph Epstein, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed on the basis of Judge Leadbetter’s opinion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John F. Povilaitis, Chief Counsel, Bohdan R. Pankiew, 1st Dep. Chief Counsel, Kevin J. Moody, Asst. Counsel, Ramona C. Cataldi, Harrisburg, for Public Utility Com’n.
Alan J. Barak, Harrisburg, for Sierra Club, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
731 A.2d 133
SIERRA CLUB, the Commission on Economic Opportunity of Luzerne County, and Eric Joseph Epstein, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 18, 1998.
Decided June 24, 1999.
John F. Povilaitis, Chief Counsel, Bohdan R. Pankiew, 1st Dep. Chief Counsel, Kevin J. Moody, Asst. Counsel, Ramona C. Cataldi, Harrisburg, for Public Utility Com’n.
Alan J. Barak, Harrisburg, for Sierra Club, et al.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
